data.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion III
data.meta_description: Neon Genesis Evangelion III is a soundtrack album featuring music from the anime TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion. It was composed by Shiro Sagisu. The album was published by King Records via its label STARCHILD with the catalog number KICA-300. It was released on 22 May 1996.[2] In North...
data.text:
Neon Genesis Evangelion III is a soundtrack album featuring music from the anime TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion. It was composed by Shiro Sagisu. The album was published by King Records via its label STARCHILD with the catalog number KICA-300. It was released on 22 May 1996.[2] In North America, it was published by Geneon Entertainment with the catalog number 5250-2, it was released on 06 July 2004.[3]It was later re-released as a DVD audio disc with the catalog number KIAW-23 on 22 December 2004.[4] It was also re-released in Japan on 18 December 2013, as a remastered version called NEON GENESIS EVANGELION III [2013 HR Remaster Ver.][5]. The album reached a peak of rank 1 on the Oricon album database, with 11 frequent appearances.

For the OSTs Evangelion I-III, Sagisu received the 1997 Kobe Animation award for "Best Music Score".[6] The cover was illustrated by Shinya Hasegawa.
